description:
Fantastic cave, with incredible formations and transparent blue waters. This is one of the best caves in the World and a must see if you are in Mallorca.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Access is limited to 6 to 12 people per week and must be accompanied by a guide. Make sure to request permits in advance, because the waiting list can be up to one year.

Rafael Minguillon is one of few official guides and knows the cave extremely well, highly recommended to choose him as your guide. Contact him on https://www.facebook.com/rafael.minguillon to find out what dates he guides.

Beta sites

  • https://ca.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cova_des_Pas_de_Vallgornera
  • http://www.covavallgornera.org/
  • http://scholarcommons.usf.edu/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?article=1794&context=ijs
